directions: In large pitcher, combine gelatin, soft drink mix, sugar and boiling water.  Stir until powders are dissolved.  Add enough cold water to make 2 quarts.  Pour into 3 oz. paper drinking cups and freeze until hardened.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package fruit flavored Jell-O® mix
1 unsweetened, flavored soft drink mix package
title: Homemade Ice Pops
